subject: SB #3 Back for repair
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_3561.575057b2.396a6103_boundary
Content-Type: multipart/alternative;
	boundary="part1_3561.575057b2.396a6103_alt_boundary"


--part1_3561.575057b2.396a6103_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


This is one of the earlier boxes that i gave kristin.  These early  boxes i 
made, i have to look with blinders on.  The soldering is horrible  and the 
wire i used was stranded and not solid.  I didn't want to rebuild  the whole 
box, so i just repaired what i needed to and secured the rest AS  IS.  It 
sounds ok now.  I tested it's durability by throwing it at my  couch to see 
if it would break, it passed....so we're good.
 
-Steve
 
 
 
Steve Hultay
